newsitem.title: GREECE: GREEK PARLIAMENT OKS NEW DEP, DEPA PRES, MANAGING DIRECTORS.
newsitem.headline: GREEK PARLIAMENT OKS NEW DEP, DEPA PRES, MANAGING DIRECTORS.

text.p: The hearing committee of the Greek parliament approved the appointment of Dimitris Lalas as president of the Public Petroleum Corporation (DEP) and Eleftherios Tzelas as managing director and president of ELDA state refineries, parliament officials told Reuters.

The committee also approved the appointment of Christos Voudouris as president of the Public Gas Corporation (DEPA) and Savvas Papafylippou as its managing director, the officials said. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
